Others: New Orleans Pelicans (6-29, 15th in the Western Conference) vs. Washington Wizards (6-26, 15th in the Eastern Conference)
The Wizards are 5-13 on their home court.
The Pelicans are 1-15 on the road.
The Wizards average 109.3 points per game, 8.7 fewer points than the 118.0 the Pelicans give up.
The Wizards average 107.4 points per game, 14.8 fewer points than the 122.2 the Wizards allow to opponents.
Jordan Poole is scoring 21.8 points per game with 2.7 rebounds and 5.0 assists for the Wizards.
Yves Missi is scoring 9.4 points per game and averaging 8.5 rebounds for the Pelicans.
